message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $100 is a bit low for me. I can do $140, and that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm still a bit far off from $140. Can you think about $130? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll do $135. That's the lowest I can go. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I still think $130 is a fair price for the product. Can you meet me at $130?
I'm starting to think we're getting a bit stuck, Bob! I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll do $137.50, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with $137.50. I was thinking more along the lines of $128. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm starting to think we're really close, Bob! I can see you're trying to get a good deal. I'll meet you at $132, but that's as low as I can go. After that, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $132, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a better deal. I'll do $129, and that's my final offer.
